definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: One makes baskets by interlacing reeds or fibers.
Entanglement, meanwhile, is the roping together of particles in order to add more qubits.
sentences.chinese: 而缠结则是编结粒子，以此增加丘比特数。

sentences.english: This VCD introduces the seven basic ways to make Chinese knots .
sentences.chinese: 本片介绍最基本的七种中国结编结方法。

sentences.english: They were able to braid a rope.
She keeps her knitting in a bag.
sentences.chinese: 她把自己在编结的东西放在袋子里。

sentences.english: Knotting technique is an old subject in knitted wear design field.
sentences.chinese: 编结方法是针织服装设计领域中的一门古老的科目。

sentences.english: She could knit up a babys coatee in an afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 她一个下午就能编结好一件婴孩的紧身短上衣。

sentences.english: She was knitting with deft fingers.
sentences.chinese: 她用灵巧的手指编结著。

sentences.english: The little girl tangled the yarn her mother was knitting.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩把她妈妈在编结的毛线弄得纠结在一起了。

sentences.english: Sea boot stockings,unraveled, could be re-knitted as teddy bears.
sentences.chinese: 水手靴长袜拆开了就可以被重新编结成泰迪熊。

sentences.english: She was knitting - something white and soft and fleecy .
sentences.chinese: 她正在编结的活是一件白色柔软的羊毛织衣。

definition: to weave/to knit/to plait/to braid/(fig.) to create (sth abstract, e.g. a dream, a lie etc)
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
